sentences.en: According to Gosling, the professional snoop must be careful about jumping to any quick conclusions.
sentences.cn: 据高斯林称, 职业的窥探者必须小心,不要急于下结论.

sentences.en: At last count, Snoop has lived well over 100 alter - egos.
sentences.cn: 据最后一次统计, 史努比已经以100个造型出现过.

sentences.en: But the eerie vista revealed by Snoop Dog on that 1995 expedition made Cameron hunger for more.
sentences.cn: 但是,嗅犬在1995年这场探险所显示的迷人画面,却使科麦隆渴求得到更多发现.

sentences.en: Dishonest? I wouldn't have to snoop around if you were honest with Luke.
sentences.cn: 不诚实? 你要是对卢克诚实的话,我就不用在你的背后偷偷摸摸的了.

sentences.en: Do not let me catch you snoop again!
sentences.cn: ——可别让我再看到你偷偷摸摸的探头头脑!

sentences.en: I head back to his trailer for a little snoop work.
sentences.cn: 我返回他的拖车,做了一些侦查工作.

sentences.en: I've just had a snoop round.
Look Snoop Dogg just got a fuckin'boob job!
sentences.cn: 看啊我们的snoopy小狗居然有了个笨蛋工作.

sentences.en: Ricardo was the one she'd seen snooping around Kim's hotel room.
sentences.cn: 里卡多就是她曾见过的在金的旅馆房间里到处窥探的那个人。

sentences.en: So , first of all, we need to move Snoop Dogg to my table.
sentences.cn: 首先, 我们要把史奴比狗狗移到我这桌.

sentences.en: The house perfects often snoop around our campus at night.
sentences.cn: 学生纠察队经常夜间在校园里巡逻.

sentences.en: The policeman has special permission to snoop into the office records.
sentences.cn: 那位警察获得特许可调查该室档案.

sentences.en: Thou shalt not snoop around in other people's computer files.
sentences.cn: 不应窥探他人的计算机文件.

sentences.en: Thou shalt not snoop around in other people's files.
sentences.cn: 即若能,也不要到处窥视别人的档案.

sentences.en: You should not snoop around in other peoples files.

words.tran_cn: 私家侦探，到处窥视；爱管闲事的人

trans.tran_cn: 探听, 调查, 偷窃
trans.tran_en: If someone snoops around a place, they secretly look around it in order to find out things
